DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial High Intensity Laser Therapy ( HILT ) Elbow Epicondylosis
DOC.detailed_description: The diagnosed patient epicondylosis treat HILTERAPIA HIRO 3.O total four session entire duration treatment protocol . Parameters evaluate tenderness , pain upon active resistive motion DASH score . After every treatment session HILTERAPIA HIRO 3.O , say parameter record initially first treatment , one week initial treatment , two week initial treatment four week initial treatment . Patient advise follow-up 6th 12 month post initial HILTERAPIA HIRO 3.O treatment reevaluation parameter . Tenderness describe pain upon palpation categorize , 0= tenderness , 1 = mild tenderness , 2 = tenderness evident facial expression 3 = patient scream upon palpation . Pain also note upon active resistive motion extension/flexion , supination/pronation . Classification include ; 0 = pain 1 = mild pain full power , 2 = severe pain full power , 3 = muscle weakness pain . And functional scoring use DASH multidimensional disease specific , brief , self-administered measure symptoms functional status among subject upper limb disorder . The DASH consist 30-item questionnaire 5 response option item scale range 0 , indicate `` least disability , '' 100 , indicate `` disability . '' A change 12.7 DASH score point consider represent clinically significant functional improvement .
